dc_title_s: Map no. VII showing places of residence of 7541 alleged male offenders placed in the Cook County jail during the year 1920, 17-75 years of age /prepared by research sociologists; Behavior Research Fund, Chicago.
dc_description_s: Originally published in: Delinquency areas: a study of the geographic distribution of school truants, juvenile delinquents, and adult offenders in Chicago / Clifford R. Shaw, with the collaboration of Frederick M. Zorbaugh, Henry D. McKay, Leonard S. Cottrell. Chicago, Ill.: University of Chicago Press, 1929.; Scale [ca. 1:122,500]; photocopy; Master and use copy. Digital master created according to Benchmark for Faithful Reproductions of Monographs and Serials, Version 1. Digital Library Federation, December 2002.
dct_isPartOf_sm: University of Chicago Social Science Maps
